page.title: 01OUR AREA, COTEHILL
page.content: In the middle of our area is a village called Cotehill.The village has grown because of the Gypsum quarry.The quarry isn't used any more.We have estimated the population is 312 people.We have a main road down one side of our block and a railway line down the other.There is a policeman in Cotehill.He lives in a police station which is also where he lives.There is an old quarry pond which they were going to drain to make it into a rubbish dump.They drained it once then they decided it would cost too much money to buy a plug for the bottom. There was some trees by the vicarage but a few years ago they were burnt down because of a bonfire which got out of control.Around our village and most of our area is grassland used for farming.
